text: Operation Neptune is the code name for the Allied Invasion of Normandy during World War II. Operation Neptune may also refer to: *Operation Neptune (espionage), a disinformation campaign by communist Czechoslovakia in 1964 *Operation Neptune (Afghanistan) (2005) *Operation Neptune (New Zealand), a commemoration of the 75th anniversary of the New Zealand Navy *Operation Neptune (video game), a computer game ==See also== *Operation Neptune Spear, the killing of Osama Bin Laden
title: Operation Neptune (disambiguation)
